name: Farkle 10000
description:
Farkle 10000 is a classic folk dice game designed for fast and responsive game play. Pass and play with your favorite rules against friends or family, play against the computer, or play a solitaire game.

Farkle 10000 has three different types of games (multiplayer, solitaire, and 10k solitaire), and over a thousand combinations of scoring options so you can choose your favorite rules.

Multiplayer games can have up to 8 players on iPad and up to 4 players on iPhone/iPod Touch.
